snippet.title: Pixel Galaxy Launch Trailer | Windows/Mac
snippet.description:
GROW. MAKE FRIENDS. SURVIVE TOGETHER. Available on Steam, Humble Store, and more on October 2nd for Windows and Mac! 

Add to your Steam wishlist here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/370480

Description:

In this non-shooting shoot 'em up, you are a single white pixel who can absorb the bodies, abilities, and weapons of every enemy pixel you collect. It's up to you to stay either small and nimble, or turn large and powerful. Protect your core white pixel, because every mistake could be your last. 

Featuring over a dozen bosses, 5 modes, 6 difficulties, and co-op multiplayer!  

Developed by Serenity Forge.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SerenityForge
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SerenityForge
